SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.history

Interface IHistorySubject

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameBoardFacade
public interface IHistorySubject
The IHistorySubject interface defines methods for managing and notifying listeners about changes in the command history. Implementations of this interface can add, remove, and notify history listeners.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addHistoryListener(IHistoryListener listener)
    Adds a history listener to receive updates about changes in the command history.
    void
    notifyHistoryListeners(Consumer<? super IHistoryListener> algorithm)
    Notifies all registered listeners about a change in the command history.
    void
    removeHistoryListener(IHistoryListener listener)
    Removes a history listener, so it no longer receives updates about changes in the command history.

  • Method Details

    • addHistoryListener

      void addHistoryListener(IHistoryListener listener)
      Adds a history listener to receive updates about changes in the command history.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to add

    • removeHistoryListener

      void removeHistoryListener(IHistoryListener listener)
      Removes a history listener, so it no longer receives updates about changes in the command history.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to remove

    • notifyHistoryListeners

      void notifyHistoryListeners(Consumer<? super IHistoryListener> algorithm)
      Notifies all registered listeners about a change in the command history.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - a Consumer function that takes an IHistoryListener and performs some action with it
